Who: RODIMUS, Perceptor
Location: Black Fortress - Cell Block Control Room

> Perceptor walked towars the Room that Rodimus was and he came in, he hadnt
> hear any word of the conversation that rodimus and tucson had had.
>
> "Are you all right?"said the blind Predacon"I feel you... Agitated"

Before the door slid open there was a small bell that went off, the
warning that someone was coming. This was a warning put in so that the
guard in the room could never be surprised by anyone entering the
room. This was typically useful for the transport of prisoners, but at
this time it worked in Rodimus' favor as he was able to hit the mute
button so Tuscon's reply - if there was one - would not be broadcast
into the room.

"I'm doing fine." Rodimus said trying to force his voice into a
semblance of calm for Perceptor, he wasn't sure if it was working.

"I'm just watching the prisoners." he said as he leaned back in his
chair and began idly flipping through the screens and the cells,
trying to look as calm and unagitated as possible.

The screen switched to display Nightshift.

(TAG)

Preston
